CustomField.formula: IF(Jun_Revenue_Amount__c > 0, ADDMONTHS(DATE(VALUE(Financial_Year__c),06,01),1), IF(May_Revenue_Amount__c > 0, ADDMONTHS(DATE(VALUE(Financial_Year__c),05,01),1), IF(Apr_Revenue_Amount__c > 0, ADDMONTHS(DATE(VALUE(Financial_Year__c),04,01),1), IF(Mar_Revenue_Amount__c > 0, ADDMONTHS(DATE(VALUE(Financial_Year__c),03,01),1), IF(Feb_Revenue_Amount__c > 0, ADDMONTHS(DATE(VALUE(Financial_Year__c),02,01),1), IF(Jan_Revenue_Amount__c > 0, ADDMONTHS(DATE(VALUE(Financial_Year__c),01,01),1), IF(Dec_Revenue_Amount__c > 0, ADDMONTHS(DATE(VALUE(Financial_Year__c)-1,12,01),1), IF(Nov_Revenue_Amount__c > 0, ADDMONTHS(DATE(VALUE(Financial_Year__c)-1,11,01),1), IF(Oct_Revenue_Amount__c > 0, ADDMONTHS(DATE(VALUE(Financial_Year__c)-1,10,01),1), IF(Sep_Revenue_Amount__c > 0, ADDMONTHS(DATE(VALUE(Financial_Year__c)-1,09,01),1), IF(Aug_Revenue_Amount__c > 0, ADDMONTHS(DATE(VALUE(Financial_Year__c)-1,08,01),1), IF(Jul_Revenue_Amount__c > 0, ADDMONTHS(DATE(VALUE(Financial_Year__c)-1,07,01),1), NULL))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Last Revenue Realized
